============================================================================

IMPORTANT NOTE
--------------
This is an illustrative Digital Product Passport (DPP) in plain text for the
Viessmann Vitocal 250‑A family, variant: AWO‑E‑AC 251.A08. It is **not** an official
manufacturer document. Values marked 'verify' must be confirmed against the
official datasheet and EPREL entry before any compliance use.

1) PRODUCT IDENTIFICATION
-------------------------
Brand: Viessmann
Family / Trade name: Vitocal 250‑A
Variant / Type code: AWO‑E‑AC 251.A08
Product type: Air‑to‑water heat pump (monobloc)
Refrigerant: R290 (propane)
GTIN: 04012345678970
MPN / Package code: (enter your SKU)
Serial number: VSN-AWO‑E‑AC251.A08-A2CFC924DF
Manufacture date: 2025-07-10 (sample)
Batch / Lot: B20250710-66 (sample)
Country of origin / Plant: DE / Allendorf (sample)
EPREL ID: (enter EPREL ID here)

GS1 Digital Link (example): https://id.gs1.org/01/04012345678970/21/VSN-AWO‑E‑AC251.A08-A2CFC924DF

2) MANUFACTURER & CONTACTS
--------------------------
Legal name: Viessmann Climate Solutions SE
Address: Viessmannstraße 1, 35108 Allendorf (Eder), Germany
Website: https://www.viessmann-climatesolutions.com
Email: info@viessmann.com
Telephone: +49 (0) 6452 (enter)
EU authorised representative: Same as manufacturer (sample)

3) REGULATORY, SAFETY & COMPLIANCE (sample statuses)
----------------------------------------------------
CE Declaration of Conformity: Available on request (sample).
Applicable directives/regulations:
• 2014/35/EU Low Voltage Directive — Conforms (sample)
• 2014/30/EU EMC Directive — Conforms (sample)
• 2014/68/EU Pressure Equipment Directive — Conforms (sample)
• 2011/65/EU RoHS — Compliant (sample)
• REACH (EC 1907/2006) — No SVHC >0.1% w/w (manufacturer statement; verify)
• WEEE 2012/19/EU — Category: Temperature exchange equipment

Refrigerant safety:
• Class: A3 (flammable)
• Factory charge (kg): ~1.8
• Precautions: Qualified installer; ventilation; control ignition sources during service;
  use HC‑rated (for R290) or A2L‑rated (for R32) recovery & leak‑detection equipment.
• Standards to observe: EN 378 series; national codes.

4) ENERGY & PERFORMANCE (illustrative; verify)
----------------------------------------------
Modernization capability: Max flow temperature up to 70 °C (verify model limits).
Rated heating capacity: ~2.2–8.2 kW @ A‑7/W35 (verify).
Selected performance points (family‑typical; confirm exact model):
• COP A2/W35 ≈ 4.40
• COP A7/W55 ≈ 2.90
• SCOP 35 °C ≈ 4.5 (avg climate, indicative)

Cooling function: Yes (verify for your package)
Acoustics (approx.; verify):
• Sound power outdoors: 53 dB(A)
• Sound pressure indoors @1 m: 40 dB(A)
Operating range (indicative): down to approx. −20 °C ambient (verify).

5) DIMENSIONS, CONNECTIONS & ELECTRICAL (verify exact variant)
--------------------------------------------------------------
Outdoor unit (W×H×D): 1144 × 1382 × 600 | Weight: ~205 kg
Indoor unit (W×H×D): 450 × 920 × 360 | Weight: ~46 kg
Ingress protection: IPX4
Hydraulics (typical):
• Max system pressure: 3 bar
• Connections: 3/4″ (verify)
• Expansion vessel: External
Electrical:
• Max current: ~18–20 A (verify)
• Breaker: ~25 A (verify)

6) MATERIALS & SUBSTANCES (indicative totals)
---------------------------------------------
Bill of materials (approx. kg):
• Steel ~65; Aluminium ~22; Copper ~18; Plastics/elastomers ~14; Electronics ~3
• Refrigerant (R290 (propane)) ~~1.8 kg (verify)
Critical raw materials: Copper (system), Lithium (if buffer battery), semiconductors (PCBs)
REACH Candidate List: None >0.1% w/w (declare if otherwise)
RoHS: Compliant (declare exemptions if any)

7) SOFTWARE, CONNECTIVITY & CYBERSECURITY
-----------------------------------------
Controller: Viessmann One Base (family; naming may vary)
Connectivity: Local controller; optional app/cloud; Modbus/RTU (optional kit)
Firmware version: (enter if known)
Update policy: Security/feature updates during lifecycle (confirm with supplier)
Data & privacy: Local control by default; cloud optional (confirm scope)
Ports/services: Service USB; potential LAN/Wi‑Fi via gateway (verify)

8) MAINTENANCE, REPAIR & SPARE PARTS
------------------------------------
Routine maintenance:
• Annually: Clean coils/fan/drains; check condensate; functional and safety tests
• Every 2 years: Electrical checks; firmware review
• As needed: Firmware updates; filter/strainer checks (site‑specific)
Repairability: Service ports present (hydrocarbon‑rated tools if R290)
Spare parts availability target: 10 years (confirm)

9) INSTALLATION & COMMISSIONING
-------------------------------
• Qualified HVAC installer only; perform leak‑tightness and safety checks.
• Configure heating curves; verify water quality and flow rates.
• Ensure defrost drain path; confirm condensate management.
• Verify clearances for airflow and service access.
• If integrated DHW cylinder present, disinfect per local guidance and
  set anti‑legionella schedules as required.

10) END‑OF‑LIFE (EoL) & CIRCULARITY
-----------------------------------
WEEE: Temperature exchange equipment — return via authorized channels.
Refrigerant handling: Recover using equipment rated for R290 (propane); trained personnel only.
Material separation: Copper, aluminium, steel recycled; PCBs to WEEE hazardous fraction.
Indicative disassembly time: ~45 minutes (skilled technician; site‑dependent).

11) ENVIRONMENTAL FOOTPRINT (illustrative)
------------------------------------------
Embodied carbon (cradle‑to‑gate): ~620 kg CO₂e (placeholder; run an EPD/LCI for accuracy)
Methodology: EN 15804‑style estimate; assumptions to be documented.
Use‑phase note: Real‑world emissions depend on grid mix and in‑situ SCOP.

12) WARRANTY (example; enter your terms)
----------------------------------------
Standard: 2 years parts & labour
Compressor: 5 years
Conditions: Qualified commissioning; annual service per schedule.

13) TRACEABILITY & DATA CARRIER
-------------------------------

Digital Link (QR/NFC): https://id.gs1.org/01/04012345678970/21/VSN-AWO‑E‑AC251.A08-A2CFC924DF
